name: Poly-F1 Racing
description:
Formation lap is almost over, as you push gently on the throttle and brutally steer 1 last time from left to right, trying to maintain a high temperature on your wheels. You know it's the key to get through the 1 st corner as fast as you can. Probably it will allow you to make a good start and overtake the two cars in front of you. They already reached their starting spots.

1 st red light of the traffic light turns on. You did this already, you know how to do it. Your right foot pushes gently gas pedal.
Second red light is on, rpm hits the limiter.
Third red light is on. The engine now howles loud, while you try to find the right rpms for a perfect start.
Four red light is on. The heat distortion waves of the formula cars in front of you suggest all drivers are ready for the fight.
Fifth red light is on. A fast glance to the steering wheel display. Everything is ok.
Lights are out...

Game Features :

  • Customizable Formula and Sports cars.
  • Day and Night different exciting circuits.
  • Side Mini-Map feature for better driving experience.
  • Exciting AI for great challenges!
  • 2 different modes- Lap Modes, Casual vehicle modes(includes all different multi-vehicles).
  • 3 Camera Modes - FP, TP and far view mode.
  • Cash-Credits system for in-game purchases.
  • A surprsing special mode made !

Now, C'mon guys download it to your devices and share your experiences and reviews with me and don't forget to provide your feedbacks.

Share it among your circle too,

Cheers, R45productions!
